content: What happens if you consume a kiwi?

Consuming a kiwi can have several benefits for your health. Kiwis are rich in vitamins C and E, as well as potassium and fiber. They may help improve digestion, lower blood pressure, and support heart health. However, some people may be allergic to kiwis or experience digestive discomfort after eating them. It's essential to listen to your body and consult a healthcare professional if you have any concerns about incorporating kiwis into your diet.
